HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 89 Kč. Free for orders over 2 500 Kč. A packing fee of 25 Kč is charged for orders under 350 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Next business day if ordered by 10:00.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Balíkovna: 59 Kč, GLS - výdejní místa: 59 Kč, PPL výdejní místa: 59 Kč, Zásilkovna: 64 Kč. All are free for orders over 2 500 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: GLS - výdejní boxy: 59 Kč, PPL Alzaboxy: 59 Kč, PPL Parcelboxy: 59 Kč, Zásilkovna ZBox: 64 Kč. All are free for orders over 2 500 Kč.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: Praha: 39 Kč, Chrudim: 15 Kč. Free for orders over 2 500 Kč.

express_delivery.delivery_time: Same business day (order by 08:30 for Prague, by 12:00 for Chrudim).

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The store offers home delivery, parcel shop/locker pickup, and in-store pickup.
PROVIDERS: Carriers include PPL, GLS, Zásilkovna, and Česká pošta (Balíkovna).
PRICING: Delivery costs range from 15 Kč (in-store pickup in Chrudim) to 89 Kč (home delivery). Free shipping is available for all methods on orders over 2,500 Kč. A packing fee of 25 Kč applies to orders under 350 Kč.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Most delivery options offer next-business-day delivery if the order is placed before the specified cut-off time. Same-day pickup is available at the store's own pickup points in Prague and Chrudim. No information is provided for COD surcharges, weekend delivery, or bulky item shipping.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented on a dedicated, well-structured page. Each delivery method is clearly detailed with its price, delivery timeframe, and order deadline. The main omission is the lack of information on payment-related surcharges (like COD) and weekend delivery options.
